snippet: Businesses in Monterrey, Mexico, are committing money and other resources to help improve security and economic and educational conditions to counter drug violence.
abstract: Businesses in Monterrey, Mexico, are committing money and other resources to help improve security and economic and educational conditions to counter drug violence; city has become battleground in the country's drug war.
lead_paragraph: Businesses in Monterrey, Mexico, are committing money and other resources to help improve security and economic and educational conditions to counter drug violence.

headline.seo: Mexican Businesses Pitch In to Counter Violence in Monterrey
headline.main: With Stake in Stability, Businesses in Mexico Help City Shaken by Violence
headline.print_headline: With a Stake in Stability, Mexican Businesses Help a City Shaken by Violence
